action.action-desc: Ms. Brown of Ohio (for herself, Mrs. Beatty, Ms. Kaptur, Mr. Balderson, Mr. Ryan, Mr. Joyce of Ohio, Mr. Carey, and Mr. Gonzalez of Ohio) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To designate the Kol Israel Foundation Holocaust Memorial in Bedford Heights, Ohio, as a national memorial.

section.header: Designation of the Kol Israel Foundation Holocaust Memorial as a national memorial

paragraph.text: recognizes the significance of the Kol Israel Foundation Holocaust Memorial in preserving the memory of the 6,000,000 Jews murdered by the Nazi regime and allies and collaborators of the Nazi regime; and
honors the life and legacy of the Holocaust survivors who erected the Kol Israel Foundation Holocaust Memorial.
The Kol Israel Foundation Holocaust Memorial located in Bedford Heights, Ohio, is designated as a national memorial.

subparagraph.text: The national memorial designated by paragraph (1) is not a unit of the National Park System.
The designation of the national memorial by paragraph (1) shall not require or permit Federal funds to be expended for any purpose related to the national memorial.
